title: Yin Yang Shi: Ping An Wu Yu
synopsis: The courtyard is awash with cherry blossom petals, appearing especially beautiful in the moonlight. Kagura, waking up, sits in the hallway facing the courtyard, "The courtyard at night, seems like something can happen anytime......"
related_anime: ['Bai Gui Youeryuan', 'Yin Yang Shi: Ping An Wu Yu 2nd Season', 'Onmyou Hyakki Monogatari']
characters: ['Yao, Bikuni', 'Kagura', 'Minamoto no, Hiromasa', 'Abe no, Seimei', 'Hotarugusa', 'Kuro-doji', 'Seimei, Kuro', 'Yokinshi', 'Jikikaeru', 'Kyonshi, Imoto']
